name: Agency Lead Times Report
query:
SELECT
    a.agency_name AS "Agency:Data:150",
    ai.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
    ai.min_order_qty AS "Min Order Qty:Int:120",
    ai.lead_time_days AS "Lead Time (Days):Int:120"
FROM `tabAgency` a
JOIN `tabAgencyItems` ai ON ai.parent = a.name
WHERE a.is_active = 1
ORDER BY a.agency_name, ai.item_code
